typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Book_Id as integer '##0',
		ISBN as string,
		ISBN13 as string,
		Title as string,
		Author as string,
		{Author_l-f} as string,
		Additional_Authors as string,
		Average_Rating as string,
		Publisher as string,
		Binding as string,
		Number_of_Pages as integer '##0',
		Year_Published as integer '##0',
		Original_Publication_Year as integer '##0'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> BookCsv
source(output(
		Book_Id as integer '##0',
		ISBN as string,
		ISBN13 as string,
		My_Rating as integer '##0',
		Date_Read as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Date_Added as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Bookshelves as string,
		Exclusive_Shelf as string,
		My_Review as string,
		Spoiler as boolean,
		Private_Notes as string,
		Read_Count as integer '##0',
		Original_Purchase_Date as date 'dd/MM/yyyy'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> TrixiesHistory
source(output(
		Book_Id as integer '##0',
		ISBN as string,
		ISBN13 as string,
		My_Rating as integer '##0',
		Date_Read as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Date_Added as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Bookshelves as string,
		Exclusive_Shelf as string,
		My_Review as string,
		Spoiler as boolean,
		Read_Count as integer '##0',
		Original_Purchase_Date as date 'dd/MM/yyyy'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> KeikosHistory
source(output(
		Book_Id as integer '##0',
		ISBN as string,
		My_Rating as integer '##0',
		Date_Read as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Date_Added as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Bookshelves as string,
		Exclusive_Shelf as string,
		My_Review as string,
		Spoiler as boolean,
		Private_Notes as string,
		Read_Count as integer '##0',
		Original_Purchase_Date as date 'dd/MM/yyyy'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Minervashistory
source(output(
		Book_Id as integer '##0',
		ISBN as string,
		ISBN13 as string,
		My_Rating as integer '##0',
		Date_Read as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Date_Added as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Original_Purchase_Date as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Spoiler as boolean,
		Bookshelves as string,
		Exclusive_Shelf as string,
		Private_Notes as string,
		Read_Count as integer '##0',
		My_Review as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SvensHistory
KeikosHistory derive(Reader = 'Keiko Brooks') ~> AddReaderNameK
TrixiesHistory derive(Reader = 'Trixie Belden') ~> AddReaderNameT
Minervashistory derive(Reader = 'Minerva Snape') ~> AddReaderNameM
SvensHistory derive(Reader = 'Sven Dorjadt') ~> AddReaderNameS
AddReaderNameT, AddReaderNameK, AddReaderNameM, AddReaderNameS union(byName: true)~> AllReader
AllReader sort(asc(Book_Id, true)) ~> SortReadingHistory
SortReadingHistory, BookCsv join(AllReader@Book_Id == BookCsv@Book_Id
	&& AllReader@ISBN == BookCsv@ISBN,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinReadersToBook
JoinReadersToBook select(mapColumn(
		Book_Id = BookCsv@Book_Id,
		ISBN = BookCsv@ISBN,
		ISBN13 = BookCsv@ISBN13,
		My_Rating,
		Date_Read,
		Date_Added,
		Bookshelves,
		Exclusive_Shelf,
		My_Review,
		Spoiler,
		Private_Notes,
		Read_Count,
		Original_Purchase_Date,
		Reader,
		Title,
		Author,
		{Author_l-f},
		Additional_Authors,
		Average_Rating,
		Publisher,
		Binding,
		Number_of_Pages,
		Year_Published,
		Original_Publication_Year
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveDuplicates
RemoveDuplicates sink(input(
		{770565} as string,
		{The One Minute Manager Meets the Monkey} as string,
		{Kenneth H. Blanchard} as string,
		{Blanchard, Kenneth H.} as string,
		{William Oncken Jr.} as string,
		{0688103804} as string,
		{9780688103804} as string,
		{07} as string,
		{4.04} as string,
		{William Morrow Paperbacks} as string,
		Paperback as string,
		{137} as string,
		{198912} as string,
		{198913} as string,
		Prop_14 as string,
		{26/08/2019} as string,
		paperback as string,
		{paperback (#543)} as string,
		read as string,
		Prop_19 as string,
		{020} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['InnerJoinDataset'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ReaderBooksInnerJoin
